text:
Paul Heller (also known as Paul M. Heller; 25 September 1927 – 28 December 2020) was an American movie producer. His best known movies include "Enter the Dragon", "Withnail and I", "My Left Foot", "The Annihilation of Fish", "Skin Games", "Hot Potato", "The Promise", "Black Belt Jones", and "David and Lisa".
Heller died on 28 December 2020, aged 93.
